payments.description: An array containing payments made by the customer.

paymentLot.description: An identifier for the batch process that processed the payment and assigned it to the taxpayer's account.

paymentLotItem.description: An identifier for each payment within a payment lot. paymentLot and paymentLotItem together uniquely identify a payment.

paymentReference.description: A unique reference number associated with the payment.

paymentAmount.description:
The amount of the payment received into the account. 

The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentMethod.description:
The method used to make the payment. 

Must conform to the regular expression:
^[0-9A-Za-z]{1,30}$

transactionDate.description: The date the payment was received into the account in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

allocations.description: A list of charges which are allocated amounts from the payment

chargeReference.description: A unique reference for the original charge that the payment was made against.

periodKey.description:
The period key attributed to the charge.

A four digit reference containing characters and numbers to identify the specific tax period.

periodKeyDescription.description: A description of the period key as a tax period.

startDate.description: The start date of the tax year for the charge in the format YYYY-MM-DD

endDate.description: The end date of the tax year for the charge in the format YYYY-MM-DD

dueDate.description: The date the charge must be paid by. Interest or penalties will be accrued after this date.

documentId.description: Same as Document Number unless on output there are no postings then the Form Bundle number is returned. Must conform to the regular expression: ^[0-9A-Za-z]{1,12}$

documentType.description: A code to specify the document type of which this is a subitem.

chargeType.description: A code to specify the type of charge.

amount.description:
The original value of this transaction.

The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

clearedAmount.description:
The cleared value of this transaction.

The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

contractAccount.description: The accounting record for a particular charge type.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.
